Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Palace Station Hotel and Casino in Las Vegas (West of The Strip), you'll be convenient to Fashion Show Mall and Las Vegas Convention Center. This casino resort is within close proximity of Las Vegas Premium Outlets and Little White Wedding Chapel.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and irons/ironing boards, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Try your luck at the casino or dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or 2 spa tubs. This resort also features complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 7 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 5 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Planning an event in Las Vegas? This resort has 20000 square feet (1858 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is complimentary (available 24 hours).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the resort's 7 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 5 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Fashion Show Mall - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Las Vegas Convention Center - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Las Vegas Premium Outlets - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Little White Wedding Chapel - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Arts Factory - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
The Auto Collections - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
High Roller - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
The Linq - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Las Vegas Springs Preserve - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
World Market Center - 3.2 km / 2 mi
Smith Center for the Performing Arts - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Crystals at City Center - 4 km / 2.5 mi
Boulevard Mall - 4 km / 2.5 mi

The preferred airport for Palace Station Hotel and Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Palace Station Hotel and Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 7 km / 4.3 mi.
